casebody.data:
GOOD HOPE HEALTH SYSTEM, LLC, Petitioner and
Town of Lillington, Petitioner Intervenor
NORTH CAROLINA DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES, DIVISION OF FACILITY SERVICES, CERTIFICATE OF NEED SECTION, and Harnett Health System, Inc., Harnett County and Wakemed, Respondents Intervenors.
Harnett Health System, Inc., Harnett County, and Wakemed, Petitioners
v.
North Carolina Department of Health and Human Services, Division of Facility Services, Certificate of Need Section, Respondent and
Good Hope Health System, LLC, Respondent-Intervenor. No. 248P07-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 26, 2008. William R. Shenton, Kenneth L. Burgess, Thomas R. West, Pamela A, Scott, Raleigh, for Harnett Health System, et al. Joy H. Thomas, for Good Hope Health System. June S. Ferrell, Assistant Attorney General, for NCDHHS. C. Winston Gilchrist, Lillington, for Town of Lillington. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 658 S.E.2d 665 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 19th day of February 2008 by Petitioner & Petitioner-Intervenor (Good Hope & Town of Lillington) in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th day of August 2008."
